about_the_game:
EMBARK ON YOUR OWN JOURNEY

  • Take control of your own team and go from championship to championship.

  • Catch the eye of a supplier and become a factory team.

  • Grow your team by developing your campus, hiring talented drivers and designers and getting better sponsor deals.

RESEARCH AND DEVELOPMENT

  • Hire the best designers right away or try to develop their skills over the seasons.

  • Make your own parts or get them from a supplier.

  • Tradeoffs will see you succeed or fail over the course of a season.

  • Launch long-term projects for a leap in performance.

ADAPT TO REGULATION CHANGES

  • Start working on the next generation race pod in advance.

  • Make sure the deal you make with a supplier will not bite you back upon a new regulation change a few seasons later.

DEVELOP YOUR OWN DRIVER ACADEMY

Let new drivers gain experience in lower championships and then promote them.

INVEST IN INFRASTRUCTURE

Develop your campus for better R&D, performance and weather forecasting.

FOCUS ON YOUR TEAM

This game is more about developping your team than managing races. You will have the opportunity to adjust some strategy elements before a race but you will not micromanage it.

BOTS PLAY BY THE RULES

Bots have to work with the same constraints as you do and do not cheat.

short_description: A racing team manager that throws micromanagement out of the window. Lead your team to victory in various championships while adapting to new challenges over the seasons. Also, bots don't cheat.
